1498070.name: Cursed Travels: Sunken City
1498070.description:
Unravel the elusive mysteries surrounding the long-lost Sunken City.

Puzzle your way through the dark lands that somehow seem connected to a greater mystery. Along with your trusty demonic sidekick and a very peculiar bunch of seafarers, it is up to you to face the horrors, puzzles and ruins somehow related to the mythical Sunken City.



Cursed Travels: Sunken City is based on the highly rated web-based Cursed Travels series. No prior knowledge is required for playing this massive installment in the series.
In Cursed Travels you take control of Farold Roberts, a peculiar man known as a night owl and famous for solving even the most terrible curses. Always accompanied by his trusty demon pal Atzlar, together they've faced many angry spirits, dark labyrinths, and cryptic seals.



- Lots of very varied mysteries, riddles and puzzles.
- Dark settings with even darker entities.
- Hours of mind-bending platforming gameplay. This game is many times bigger than any of the web games!
- Skeletons.
1498070.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
